org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.read.writer

Interface ReadToolsIOFormat

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReadToolsIOFormat.BamFormat, ReadToolsIOFormat.FastqFormat

    public interface ReadToolsIOFormat
    Interface for input/output formats of ReadTools, which contain utility methods for checking.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ReadToolsIOFormat.BamFormat
      BAM formats.
      static class  ReadToolsIOFormat.FastqFormat
      FASTQ formats.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_METRICS_EXTENSION
      Output extension for metric files.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getExtension()
      Gets the extension for this output format (including dot).
      default boolean isAssignable(java.lang.String sourceName)
      Returns true if the format is assignable to the source name; false otherwise.
      static boolean isFastq(java.lang.String sourceName)
      Checks if the file is FASTQ formatted by extensions.
      static boolean isSamBamOrCram(java.lang.String sourceName)
      Checks if the file is SAM/BAM/CRAM formatted by extension.
      static java.nio.file.Path makeMetricsFile(java.lang.String prefix)
      Creates a default metrics output without checking for the existence.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_METRICS_EXTENSION

        static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_METRICS_EXTENSION
        Output extension for metric files.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getExtension

        java.lang.String getExtension()
        Gets the extension for this output format (including dot).

      • isAssignable

        default boolean isAssignable(java.lang.String sourceName)
        Returns true if the format is assignable to the source name; false otherwise. Default implementation check the extension (ignoring case) and returns true.

      • makeMetricsFile

        static java.nio.file.Path makeMetricsFile(java.lang.String prefix)
        Creates a default metrics output without checking for the existence.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix for the output path.
        Returns:
        the metrics path.

      • isSamBamOrCram

        static boolean isSamBamOrCram(java.lang.String sourceName)
        Checks if the file is SAM/BAM/CRAM formatted by extension.
        Parameters:
        sourceName - the name of the file.
        Returns:
        true if the file ends with the extension for this format; false otherwise.

      • isFastq

        static boolean isFastq(java.lang.String sourceName)
        Checks if the file is FASTQ formatted by extensions.
        Parameters:
        sourceName - the name of the file.
        Returns:
        true if the file ends with the extension for this format; false otherwise.
